title: Cabo pulmo diving
subtitle: oldest coral reef in north america
content: Compared to other polished but proprietary CMS products, it's an attempt at offering an open source standard to Git-centric content management. In other words, it aims at leveraging the budding community to become the WordPress of JAMstack & static workflows.
body: Compared to other polished but proprietary CMS products, it's an attempt at offering an open source standard to Git-centric content management. In other words, it aims at leveraging the budding community to become the WordPress of JAMstack & static workflows.
